entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: WSW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
